portfolio.description: Front-End specialized in React and TypeScript. Focused on building scalable, high-performance web and mobile interfaces. Hands-on experience delivering real-world products using React, React Native, REST APIs, and modern frontend architectures, working in Agile environments (Scrum and Kanban) and collaborating with cross-functional teams.

journey.title: Frontend Developer (Project-Based)
journey.description: Delivering frontend solutions using React, TypeScript, and Clean Architecture. Focused on maintainable code.

journey.title: Frontend Tech Lead
journey.description: Led frontend development using React and TypeScript. Responsible for code reviews, architectural best practices, and collaborating with cross-functional Scrum teams.

journey.title: Full-Stack Developer
journey.description: Built full-stack features with a heavy focus on React.js, leveraging solid backend and database knowledge.

journey.title: Systems Developer
journey.description: Developed enterprise applications using .NET MVC, JavaScript, and SQL Server. Implemented data solutions with Power BI.

use_cases.buu_desc: Complete full-stack system built from the ground up (Web & Mobile). Robust architecture featuring React, React Native, and Node.js with a PostgreSQL database. Managed the entire product lifecycle, including infrastructure setup and automated deployments (CI/CD) using GitHub Actions, ensuring 99.9% uptime.

career.title: Enterprise Project Experience
career.subtitle: A selection of relevant projects I've contributed to throughout my career.

career.ppc_desc: Shipyard operations management system with real-time monitoring, built with React and .Net Core

awards.title: 4th Place - FAPES Innovation Program
